title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: Classic 1950s rangefinder camera, renowned for precision engineering, durable build, and superb image quality. A true collector’s gem.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Iconic vintage electric guitar with dual humbuckers, fast neck, and legendary tone. A must-have for serious guitar enthusiasts.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple’s first Macintosh computer, iconic compact design with 128K RAM. A groundbreaking piece of computing history and innovation.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Iconic luxury dive watch, stainless steel build, automatic movement, and timeless design. A collector’s favorite with lasting value.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Rare first edition of Fitzgerald’s classic novel. A literary treasure featuring original cover art and immense historical and collectible value.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Iconic 1950s lounge chair with molded plywood and leather. A timeless design classic, combining comfort, elegance, and collectible appeal.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Authentic screen print by Banksy, featuring bold social commentary and signature style. A rare and highly sought-after collector’s piece.
